name: Tax evaders
description:
Try to evade the taxes!

You can choose between 4 different companies to play as.

Try story mode  if you want to understand the message

Play endless mode to set a highscore

This project was made as an art assignment. The goal is to include an opinion about society. In this project the opinion is that if big componies don't pay taxes, te "normal" people will suffer the consequenses.
